definition: single Chinese character/word (in a foreign language)
letter/symbol/character/word/CL:個|个[ge4]/courtesy or style name traditionally given to males aged 20 in dynastic China

sentences.english: At Levels 5 and 6, the Vocabulary test measures listening vocabulary.
sentences.chinese: 在第五和第六级，单字测验是以听力为主。

sentences.english: English isn't just a list of English words.
sentences.chinese: 学习英语并非仅是死记一连串的单字。

sentences.english: You're certainly already familiar with single-byte characters.
sentences.chinese: 你一定已经很熟悉单字节字符。

sentences.english: Being able to chant fruits and review vocabularies of colors.
sentences.chinese: 会读诵水果韵文，并复习颜色的单字。

sentences.english: Local Dialect(1989)recorded thatYongchun dialect has 7 tones.
sentences.chinese: 据《永春方言志》记载，永春话有7个单字调。

sentences.english: " Stewardesses " is the longest word typed with only the left hand.
sentences.chinese: “女空服员”这个字是单用左手打字最长的一个单字。

sentences.english: If it is, I need to use single-byte length notation.
sentences.chinese: 如果是，就需要使用单字节长度表示法。

sentences.english: The most common method Taiwanese learners employ to remember vocab is memorization.
sentences.chinese: 台湾学生最经常使用的方法就是死背单字。

sentences.english: These form fields allow you to associate variables with the field.
sentences.chinese: 这些表单字段允许您将变量和字段联系起来。

sentences.english: He memorizes new English words while he rides the train to school.
sentences.chinese: 他坐火车去上学的时候，他在车上记英文单字。

sentences.english: May I sign up any autocar schools as I like just with this document? 2.
sentences.chinese: 凭这张单字，我可以随便向哪一家汽车学校报名吗？

sentences.english: Notice the obfuscated names of the form fields.
sentences.chinese: 注意，表单字段的名称很古怪。

sentences.english: Write the correct words. Cut out the Mother's Day symbols. Glue them to the right places.
sentences.chinese: 描写出单字，再剪下小图，贴在正确的框中。

sentences.english: Any word or phrase, such as stet or strike-down. means.
sentences.chinese: 任何单字或词汇，例如不删或完全删除。

sentences.english: And "lollipop" is the longest word typed with your right hand.
sentences.chinese: 而“棒棒糖”这个字是用右手打最长的一个单字。

sentences.english: The second chapter refers to studies on mono-syllable tone from the two perspectives of pitch and duration.
sentences.chinese: 第二章从音高和时长两个角度研究南京方言单字调。

definition: Zihui, Chinese character dictionary with 33,179 entries, released in 17th century
Chinese character/CL:個|个[ge4]/Japanese: kanji/Korean: hanja/Vietnamese: hán tự
component of a Chinese character (as the radical or the phonetic part)
variant of 筆畫|笔画[bi3 hua4]
the final of a Chinese syllable (the component of a syllable remaining after removal of the initial consonant, if any, and the tone, e.g. the final of "niáng" is "iang")
letter/symbol/character/word/CL:個|个[ge4]/courtesy or style name traditionally given to males aged 20 in dynastic China
